definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: Ju Jdg 10:5, Pamnwn, A Pammw (LXXL Kalkwn); in Gilead Jos:Ant. v. 7, 6 (Kamwn); prob. = Kamoun of Polyb:v. 70, 12 (named next after Pella); Buhl:Geogr. 256 thinks of Ḳumêm, Ḳamm (Schumacher:Northern Ajlûn 137 f.), between Jarmuk and Jabbok, W. of Irbid.
